K_Means_Clustering.name: K_Means_Clustering
K_Means_Clustering.description: The K_Means_Clustering class contains all the necessary logic for clustering unsupervised data.

params.name: args
params.description: Contains all the necessary parameters for K-Means clustering as listed below.

props.name: random_Init_Count
props.description: Required parameter for how many times to randomly initialize centroids.

props.name: cluster_count
props.description: Required value to specify how many clusters in total are to be initialized.

props.name: notify_count
props.description: Required value to execute the iteration_callback after every x number of iterations.

props.name: iteration_callback
props.description: Required callback that can be used for getting information for diagnostics.

classitems.description: This method serves as the logic for the calculating distance between centroids and data points.
classitems.name: distance

params.name: X
params.description: This is the unsupervised input data for clustering.

params.name: u
params.description: This is the centroid from which distance relative to all input data points will be calculated.

return.description: distance This is a matrix containing the distance of all data points relative to a centroid.

classitems.description: This method updates each centroid by calculating the mean of the respective clusters.
classitems.name: update_Centroids

return.description: this.centroids Are the updated centroids for the given data.

classitems.description: This method contains the logic to assign clusters points to different centroids.
classitems.name: assign_Clusters

params.name: X
params.description: This is the unsupervised input data for clustering.

return.description: this.clusters This is the matrix containing the clustered data.

classitems.description: This method contains the iterative implementation of the K-Means clustering algorithm.
classitems.name: start_Clustering

params.name: X
params.description: The matrix to be used as the data input for clustering.

return.description: defered.promise Returns a promise upon completion.

classitems.description: This method is reponsible for passing data to the provided callback function for the purpose of diagnostics.
classitems.name: apply_Callback

params.name: isComplete
params.description: The boolean value to indicate if the clustering is completed.

params.name: iterations
params.description: Is the number of iterations for the K-Means clustering algorithm.

return.description: info Is the object containing information for diagnostics.

classitems.description: This method is reponsible for generating unique random numbers and keeps track of previous random values.
classitems.name: unique_Random_Val

params.name: X
params.description: The matrix to be used as the unsupervised data.

classitems.description: This method is responsible to randomly initiate centroids for the given data.
classitems.name: initiate_Centroids

params.name: X
params.description: This is the unsupervised input data for clustering.

return.description: this.centroids Are the randomly genrated centroids.
